title: Best of The Herd for Apr 10, 2019
itunes:title: Best of The Herd for Apr 10, 2019
description:
Colin breaks down the ground breaking story of Magic Johnson stepping down as Los Angeles Lakers President and what should be done going forward. Also, Los Angeles Lakers writer for The Athletic Bill Oram adds more behind the scenes information about this shocking story.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
